Yeah the mother incest part is completed but I don't like it :/
"twin mother incest finally completed" that kanji below

Also, I really wish the Cousin had a different facial expression other than that obnoxiously doofy grin the entire time. And I hope/wish (though it’s extremely unlikely) that we get a 4th part/bonus short comic with just the MC doing both his Mom and Aunt

on Twin Mothers: I can’t read Japanese whatsoever, so I’m not gonna comment on the actual narrative until the translation comes out. But I will say, just from the visuals -while this is hot as fuck- this conclusion really feels like an anti-climax, not just from the last chapter cliffhanger, but for the story overall. I figured this was the most likely outcome, but the way it happens feels… really simple, barebones, a bit too “easy”. And theoretically the story would have played out the same way if the Aunt just decided to have Her and the MC reveal that THEY were the ones watching at the end of the 1st part. Maybe I’m reading FAR too much into the plot (most likely scenario), but it feels like it was building up to something… “bigger”.
All that remains is the TL to have a complete picture of Twin Mother's story, even though we already know what's going on pretty much.
